name: Flavitu-14-2
short_description:
The mission of project: is an effort with an own image that can approach people to the system, to provide and give to people security and identity with this project and increase the amount of linux users on the Euro-city Verín - Chaves.

About this version:
Flavitu Linux update version 2 , with Gambas 3 , Gambas Learning, Gambas Cortes, Gambas Creadordeorlas, Gambas GeneradorCarnets, Gambas ConstructorDiplomas, Gambas Eurocidade, ChavesMapview, Kernel find, D.D.C ... And other programs extra , activador compton, animador video, extra video tools, extra ppa, tuner terminal radio... All programs in Gambas - default lang in PT, in old version only in Spanish version, Languages - EN-PT-GL. LTS Lubuntu remastered 14.04.To download on MEGA (I have problems to host the ISO )available  in parts to be extract after down.
https://mega.co.nz/#F!zYtkDTwC!xhCgr4gqWfTLXJ6uDcGarQ
